xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin

xwikidoc.content:
platform.core.profile.category.notifications=Notificações notifications.filters.cancel=Cancelar notifications.filters.submit=Salvar notifications.filters.type.label=Tipo de filtro: notifications.filters.type.hint=Como o filtro deve agir em relação a um evento no local especificado notifications.filters.location.label=Escopo do filtro: notifications.filters.location.hint=Qual parte da wiki deve ser afetada pelo filtro?
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=Opções avançadas de filtragem notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=Esses filtros são ativados por padrão. Você pode desativá-los usando o botão ao lado de cada filtro. notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=Nome do filtro notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=Descrição notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=Alternar notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=Fechar
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=Filtro do Sistema notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=Ocultar notificações do usuário do Sistema, a menos que o evento seja especificamente direcionado a você notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Filtro de Eventos Próprios notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=Ocultar notificações sobre sua própria atividade, a menos que o evento seja especificamente direcionado a você notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=Filtro de Eventos Lidos (Alerta) notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=Ocultar notificações que você marcou como lidas notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=Filtro de Eventos Lidos (Email) notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=Ocultar notificações que você marcou como lidas notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Evento Menor (Alerta) notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Ocultar notificações referentes a mudanças menores nas páginas notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Evento Menor (Email) notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Ocultar notificações referentes a mudanças menores nas páginas
## Translation keys for the scopeNotificationFilter notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.name=Filtro de Notificação de Escopo notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.page=Apenas a página notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.space=Página e subpáginas notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.wiki=Wiki notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.user=Usuário
## Notifications toggles notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=Você precisa ativar as notificações em suas configurações se deseja acompanhar esses locais
## Notifications formats notifications.format.alert=Alerta notifications.format.email=Email
## Filter preferences settings notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=Excluindo... notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done=Preferência de filtro excluída! notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=Falha ao excluir a preferência de filtro notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=Salvando... notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=Preferência de filtro salva! notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=Falha ao salvar a preferência de filtro notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=Todos os eventos (mesmo desativados)
## System Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=Filtros do Sistema notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=Filtros do sistema que você pode alternar para ter um controle mais detalhado das notificações que deseja receber. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=Nome notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterDescription=Descrição notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=Descrição notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=Formatos notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=Está ativado?
## Custom Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=Filtros Personalizados notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=Crie filtros para controlar as notificações que deseja receber. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterPreferenceId=Identificador notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.scope=Escopo notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.location=Localização notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=Ação do Filtro notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=Eventos notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=Formatos notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=Está ativado? notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=Ações notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=Notificar o evento notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=Ignorar o evento
## Add filter modal notifications.settings.addFilter=Adicionar filtro notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=Crie um filtro para eventos que ocorrem em locais específicos. O filtro pode disparar o envio de uma notificação ou impedir que ela seja enviada, dependendo do evento e do canal de notificação. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=Localização notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=Este filtro se aplica aos eventos que ocorrem nas localizações selecionadas aqui. Selecione uma ou mais localizações. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=Ação notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=Este filtro pode notificar ou ignorar eventos que ocorrem nas localizações selecionadas. Escolha a ação que deseja realizar para os eventos. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=Notificar o evento notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=Ignorar o evento notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=Canal notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=Este filtro se aplica apenas às notificações enviadas pelos canais de comunicação selecionados abaixo. Escolha um ou mais canais de comunicação. notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=Eventos notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=Este filtro se aplica aos eventos selecionados aqui, nas localizações selecionadas acima. Escolha um ou mais eventos. notifications.menu.header=Notificações notifications.menu.header.settings=Configurações notifications.menu.clear=Limpar Tudo notifications.menu.clearing=Limpando as notificações notifications.menu.cleared=As notificações foram limpas notifications.settings.title=Preferências de Notificações notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=Você precisa ser administrador para ver isto. notifications.settings.menu=Menu de Notificações notifications.settings.menu.hint=O menu de notificações está localizado no canto superior direito da página, e você pode vê-lo clicando no sino ({0}) notifications.settings.email=Email notifications.settings.email.forGuest=aça login ou registre-se para gerenciar suas configurações de notificação. notifications.settings.email.disabled=Os emails de notificações estão desativados. Por favor, contate o administrador. notifications.settings.email.hint=Um email é enviado a você regularmente com um resumo do que aconteceu na wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.saving=Your settings are being saved... ### Missing: notifications.settings.saved=Saved! ### Missing: notifications.settings.savingfailed=Failed to save your settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters=Filters ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Error: you must select a wiki, not a page ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.appName=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.table.dropdown.toggle.label=Toggle the details for notifications from the {0} application. ### Missing: notifications.settings.events=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.events.by=edited by {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastChange=Last change: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastComment=Last ## Watch button and modal
### Missing: notifications.watch.button.title=Current notification setting for this page: {0} - Click to change it ### Missing: notifications.watch.button.status.notset=Not set ### Missing: notifications.watch.button.status.followed=Followed ### Missing: notifications.watch.button.status.blocked=Blocked ### Missing: notifications.watch.button.status.custom=Custom ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title=Notification settings for this page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.options=You can change the current notification settings with the following options: ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.ancestoroption=You can either go to {0} and modify the notification settings there or directly apply settings on the current page with the following options: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Configurações de notificação da página seguida notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Você está seguindo esta página: você receberá notificações sobre ela. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page by parent watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are following this page through a parent in the hierarchy: you will receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page and children watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are following this page and its children: you will receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.NOT_SET=Not set watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.NOT_SET=You haven't configured any settings for watching this page yet and so you are not following this page: you won't receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page by parent watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page through a parent in the hierarchy: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page and children watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page and its children: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.CUSTOM=Custom watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.CUSTOM=You are using custom notification settings for this page: you might be following or blocking specific events for the page or you might target only specific channels for the notifications. We invite you to review your notification settings from your profile. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.title=Follow current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.hint=You will receive notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.title=Follow current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.hint=You will receive notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.title=Follow entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will receive notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.title=Block current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.hint=You will block any notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.title=Block current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.hint=You will block any notifications for that page and all of its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.title=Unfollow current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.hint=You will stop receiving notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.title=Unfollow current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.hint=You will stop receiving notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.title=Unfollow entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will stop receiving notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.title=Unblock current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.hint=You will receive notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.title=Unblock current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.hint=You will receive notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.title=Unblock entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will stop ignoring notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.close=Close without saving ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.savechanges=Save changes ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.gotosettings=Manage all notifications settings
